video.title: Derek
video.synopsis: Ricky Gervais created and stars in this heartwarming comedy-drama series as a loyal English nursing home caretaker who sees only the good in everyone.

episodes.synopsis: Kindly, ever-cheerful caretaker Derek Noakes introduces himself and the hard-working staff of the nursing home where they are employed.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When the authorities cite bureaucratic budget cuts as a reason to lay off the staff and transfer the residents, Hannah, Derek and Dougie fight back.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Derek overindulges at his 50th birthday party; a rebellious teenage thief doing community service at the home discovers the power of self-respect.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The staff endures a painful loss that inspires Hannah and Tom to begin considering their on-again, off-again relationship in a more serious light.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Derek, Dougie and Kev take some residents to the beach, where they discover the power of sunshine, fresh air and writing dirty words on crabs.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A cabaret-style talent show at the home features Derek and pals as a familiar '80s pop band and an aspiring rapper who gains respect for his elders.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Derek's estranged father appears and wants to reconnect with the son he abandoned in childhood, but Derek uncharacteristically refuses to forgive him.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Derek’s estranged father Anthony moves into the nursing home, reconnects with his son and sows his wild oats; a fed-up Dougie quits his job.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Hannah and Tom receive some unconventional advice from the residents while trying to get pregnant; Kev cleans up his act to apply for a job.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: After Kev discovers his girlfriend Janice is cheating online, he invites his obnoxious brother to visit; Hannah has a big announcement.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Hannah arranges for Derek to be a zookeeper when the residents visit the London Zoo, but his joy is cut short when Hannah suffers a painful loss.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: When Derek’s favorite dog from the shelter must be put down, Kev’s kind gesture surprises everyone but Derek; Hannah gives Tom an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Derek meets the perfect match through his online dating profile; a loss at the nursing home teaches Derek that it’s never too late to make amends.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Everyone prepares for Tom and Hannah's wedding, prompting deep thoughts about life, love and the future in this special episode.
episodes.title: Special Episode
